entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
